com.ibasco.agql.core.util

Class Option<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibasco.agql.core.util.Option<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The underlying type of the option value

    public final class Option<T>
extends Object
    Represents a configuration option
    Author:
    Rafael Luis Ibasco

        Type Parameters:

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • of

        public static <V> Option<V> of(Class<? extends Options> containerClass,
                               String key)

        Retrieve an singleton Option instance using the provided class group and key combination

        Type Parameters:
        V - The underlying type of the Option
        Parameters:
        containerClass - The Class A class of type Options
        key - The key identifying the option
        Returns:
        The Option instance or null if no Option found for the specified combination.

        Type Parameters:

        Parameters:

        defaultValue - The default value to return if the initial return value is null

                                   V defaultValue)

        defaultValue - The default value for this Option
        Returns:

      • create

        public static <V> Option<V> create(String key,
                                   V defaultValue,
                                   boolean channelAttribute)
        Creates a singleton instance of an Option based on the key provided
        Type Parameters:
        V - The underlying type of the Option
        Parameters:
        key - The unique key of the option
        defaultValue - The default value for this Option
        channelAttribute - true if this option should be added as a default channel attribute
        Returns:
        A singleton Option instance based on the key provided.

      • create

        public static <V> Option<V> create(String key,
                                   V defaultValue,
                                   boolean channelAttribute,
                                   boolean autoCreate)
        Creates a singleton instance of an Option based on the key provided. NOTE: The newly created instance will not be added to the cache.
        Type Parameters:
        V - The underlying type of the Option
        Parameters:
        key - The unique key of the option
        defaultValue - The default value for this Option
        channelAttribute - true if this option should be added as a default channel attribute
        autoCreate - If true, the channel attribute will be automatically initialized in the underlying Channel regardless whether or not it is explicitly set by the client. This is only applicable when channelAttribute is set to true.
        Returns:
        A singleton Option instance based on the key provided.

      • getOptions

        public static com.google.common.collect.SetMultimap<Class<? extends Options>,Option.CacheEntry> getOptions()
        Returns a read-only SetMultimap containing of all the Options provided by this library
        Returns:
        an ImmutableSetMultimap
